title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a caesarean section in a dream

preview.html: Giving birth by caesarean section in a dream The C-section is one of the things that scares many women. In fact, if the situation calls for it because of the pain you feel after waking up from anesthesia, but some still prefer it anyway, then what if the woman sees this? Giving birth surgically in a dream? This is what we will present to you today in light of what has been reported by dream interpretation scholars. Giving birth by caesarean section in a dream. Caesarean section in the dreamer symbolizes the suffering and extreme exhaustion that he feels in his real life, especially if he feels pain during it. But if the dream is about a girl who has not yet married This expresses her determination to achieve her goals, and if she is studying at university, she is suffering a lot in her studies. A dream about a Caesarean section for a divorced woman indicates that she is facing many problems with her ex-husband and may suffer from not obtaining her legal rights after separation. Seeing a Caesarean section in a dream For a married woman, it expresses the serious differences she experiences with her husband, which cause her great psychological pain, and children may also suffer from these differences that are reflected in them. Interpretation of a dream about a caesarean section for a single girl expresses that she will be exposed to many difficulties in her life, but she will be able to overcome them. After putting in more effort. Birth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Ibn Sirin says that childbirth in any case represents the woman actually overcoming the anxiety and problems she goes through in her life, and they are waiting for happy news or the arrival of the absent traveler. The Caesarean section, from Ibn Sirin’s point of view, indicates ease and comfort. If the dreamer feels distressed in reality, and the opposite is true if the dreamer is in good condition, as the vision indicates a lack of livelihood and difficulties that may lead to the loss of money. Imam Al-Nabulsi said that the vision shows the Prophet’s repentance and abandonment of the path of misguidance in which he walked for a long time away from obedience to God (the Most High), and the Caesarean section symbolizes the difficulties he faced. Faces on the way to his repentance, or some evil friends who want to make him commit more sins out of grudge against him and their desire to tarnish his reputation. Imam Nabulsi also said that the vision may indicate separation between spouses or between the girl and her fiancé due to his bad morals. The vision can also express to the person who is suffering From the accumulation of debts on him, he will have a lot of money that will help him pay off his debts and raise the standard of living for his family and children if he is married. But if the young man is single, the vision indicates that he will be blessed with a prestigious job after a long period of searching and finding a good girl with a good reputation. To marry her. If a man sees in his dream that he is meeting a pregnant girl, then this is the girl who will marry soon and give birth to a good son. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a cesarean section for a single woman. The girl Whoever sees this vision is already experiencing some events

title: Interpretation of the play in a dream: Seeing the theater in a dream

preview.html: Theater in a dream, standing on stage, interpretation of entering the theater and watching a playInterpretation of action in a dreamThe theater in a dream symbolizes the world, the world and society. The heroes of the play in the dream may refer to the people around you. Tragic theater denotes sadness and depression, and comedic theater symbolizes fun and happiness. The work can be an encrypted message in a dream calling you to pay attention to something or warning that an issue will arise. Lyrical theater is a great sadness or the death of a close person, and the scene itself can indicate the coffin in Some explanations. The theater audience is your undoing if you are among them, and the theater audience are your enemies or opponents. If you are acting in a play, applause is a good omen and portends success, unlike whistling, which indicates failure and despair. Every woman sees in a dream that she is going to see a play that will bring about an important event. As for a tragic play in one’s dream, it indicates despair, sadness, and hopelessness. Laughter, comedy or skit indicates emotional happiness, and comedy in a married woman’s dream portends a lot. A pregnant woman's dream indicates an easy and natural birth without pain or suffering. Musical or popular theater, such as the Lebanese Dabke, suggests sadness, sorrow, and separation, and school theater is success. Interpretation of a playground in a dream. Wood and paintings in the interpretation of dreams often indicate a coffin or death, but standing on the stage to play a role in the play indicates that the dreamer has great ambition and a day will come when the dreamer embodies his success in Life on financial, practical or even emotionalInterpretation of a big theater in a dreamA big theater in a dream denotes life itself, and the heroes of the play, as well as the audience in a dream, have a sign of the people around you from family, friends, competitors and enemies. The big stage falls into whistles, insults, and bad words from the audience, this indicates disappointment, defeat, or failure, and a big stage in a person’s dream, her joy, her wedding, her wedding, and her marriage. And in a married woman’s dream of her happy home, if she sees signs of joy and happiness in it. Interpretation of buying theater tickets in a dream: Standing at the theater ticket office and buying it indicates huge expenses if you buy a lot of tickets, and a theater ticket, cinema ticket, or even a football field ticket could be a message in the dream or a reminder of something... Important I have forgotten in waking life. Such as fulfilling a promise, appointment, meeting, or the like, and a theater ticket may be an indication of a travel ticket if the person or spectator will do so. Cutting a ticket to enter a show or concert can indicate accepting a job or succeeding in a debate. Interpretation of a comic play in a dream: Comedy If you dream that you are in a comedy play, this means that you will indulge in short-term foolish pleasures. If you dream that you are watching a skit, this symbolizes pleasant pleasures and happy tasks. Interpretation of pantomime games in a dream If you dream of watching a pantomime, this foretells that your friends will deceive you.

title: Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing plasterGypsum is a material that can be like a splint to heal fractures or a building material, and seeing plaster in a dream indicates money and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing plaster in a dream, whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, and we will present it today through the site of the vision that we will discuss. Interpretation of seeing plaster in A dream in a dream, in detail in a dream, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq or contemporary translators, so follow us on the Roya website. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing plaster in a dream indicates an abundance of money and the ability to earn a living Seeing a house made of plaster in a dream indicates the fulfillment of success and desires in the dreamer’s life. Seeing red plaster in a dream, a state of illusion and mirage. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a man’s dream. Seeing buying plaster in a man’s dream. Announce happy news and events. Dreaming of falling and removing plaster in a man’s dream. Reporting bad news. Seeing it He builds a house of plaster in a man’s dream. It indicates wealth, prosperity, family, and family ties. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees that she is kneading her hands with plaster, this indicates good news, achieving success and excellence in study or work, and constantly being promoted. Seeing plaster in a dream for a single woman indicates Until her wedding date approaches. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is cutting plaster into small pieces, this indicates many problems, fears, and responsibilities, but he can resist all of this, overcome problems and quarrels, and achieve family stability. Seeing a bag full of pieces of plaster in a woman’s dream Married: It indicates wealth, wealth, friendliness, and understanding of the family. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees that she is kneading plaster with her hands, it indicates an easy birth and a healthy child that she will be very happy with. Buying plaster in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates abundant livelihood and her promotion to the status of her husband or Increase it and material reward. Interpretation of seeing plaster in a divorced and widowed woman’s dream. Seeing a plaster house in a divorced and widowed woman’s dream indicates an abundance of sustenance, an abundance of blessings in her life, and her psychological comfort. Seeing rotten plaster in a dream for a divorced and widowed woman indicates failure to achieve what he desires, failure and failure. Interpretation A dream of a man wearing a cast for a single woman. Seeing a forced man in a dream for a single woman remembers her approach to marriage. Green plaster indicates that you treat strangers with caution and care and that you act with wisdom and tact. Interpretation of a dream about eating plaster for a single woman. Seeing eating plaster in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates an abundance of good deeds and love for people. Seeing plaster mixed with water indicates resistance to many difficulties and the ability to achieve success. Interpretation of a dream of white plaster for a single woman: Seeing a white staff for a married woman in a dream, and this indicates many acquired blessings such as money, children, good health, and peace of mind. Seeing white plaster in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a boy. He is happy

title: Interpretation of seeing a wife in a dream Seeing a woman in a dream

preview.html: The wife in a dream, and among the visions that many men may have, which differ in the details and scenes they contain, and therefore differ in the interpretations and interpretations they contain, which may bring goodness to the fortune-tellers, or they. It is considered one of the bad visions, and many people were interested in learning about these interpretations according to what the translators explained, and during these lines we will learn in detail the interpretation of seeing a wife in a dream. Woman in a dream Since the scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a beautiful wife in a dream, it will be a sign of contentment in life. Her life and well-being. In this paragraph, we will explain the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream. It is also: If a person sees in a dream that a woman is pregnant. This dream is a sign of many worries and sorrows. But if a man sees his wife giving birth to a male child in a dream, this indicates that he will gain money and abundant wealth in the future. This world, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a person sees in a dream that his wife is giving birth to a baby girl, this dream is evidence of getting rid of worries and anxiety. While seeing a divorced wife in a dream is evidence of abandonment and separation between spouses, and God is Most High and knows this. See also: Interpretation of Dreams A broken phone in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about a sick wife in a dream. It is considered one of the disturbing and confusing visions for many people who are interested in knowing the explanations, interpretations, and meanings it contains, especially since it is an unpleasant vision in general and varies in its interpretation based on what the person sees. In the details of the dream, and during these lines, we will review them for the interpretation of a dream about a sick wife in a dream. It is also: If one sees in a dream that his wife is lying in bed and she is sick, then we are also in pain, we feel the pain and we may complain and moan about severe pain. This is evidence of what this woman is suffering from. Psychological problems, and the reason for this is her mistreatment of her and her children or their neglect of her. It is worth noting that sickness, pain, sickness, and different types of illnesses in a dream have psychological connotations and connotations. Accordingly, the husband must be careful in his behavior towards his wife, and spend on her according to what God has commanded. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Seeing a woman in a dream with a man, as this vision is considered one of the disturbing visions for many men, so how can his wife be with another man, and there are many interpreters who have explained its meanings, and along these lines we will explain to you. Interpretation: Seeing a woman in a dream with a man is also: This vision is a sign of the wife’s death, her love for her husband, and her wishes for happiness and prosperity. It is also evidence of her desire to always be happy in his life. In addition, if a man sees his wife cheating on him with another man In a dream. It indicates the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will obtain. He will also eat a lot in the near future, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if he sees that his wife is marrying another. It is an indication that the dreamer will achieve the desires that he dreamed and wanted, and all the goals that he sought to achieve. Cha

title: Is crying in a dream good news according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: Crying in a dream is good news. Many of us tend to see ourselves crying in a dream, but we see that some consider it a good omen for the fortuneteller, so we will know whether crying in a dream is good news or not? This is through our detailed article. Is crying in a dream good news? This dream shows us meaningful and promising meanings for everyone, as the dream shows: Getting out of any distress or distress that dominates the fortuneteller, if he is surrounded by problems at his work or in his family, solves them without causing He has any loss. The fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer dreams about and which he seeks to develop in his life and to be in high positions. Perhaps the dream expresses the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer gains during this period and that he will be very successful in his projects. Also, to see very good news if the dreamer Indebted to someone, as it expresses that he will pay all debts at the first opportunity. The vision indicates recovery from diseases and fatigue that he feels, so if he complains of any pain, he will soon get rid of it. Interpretation of a dream about crying is good news by Ibn Sirini. This dream indicates that the dreamer seeks To work optimistically without being affected by bad thoughts in his life. It also indicates that he has achieved very important achievements that enable him to advance in the field in which he works. The vision indicates that justice will be achieved and the dreamer will not suffer from any injustice that may be inflicted upon him by any other person, and also it is an expression of liberation Of the worries and sorrows that prevail in the dreamer’s reality. The dream indicates that he will obtain a great blessing in children, health, money, and age, and this will make him not go through hardship in his life. If the dreamer sees children crying in a dream, this means that he lives among people who do not have merciful hearts, However, if children cry in a very small voice, this is a clear indication of fatigue that affects the dreamer. In his body. Crying in a dream is a sure sign that all events are developing as the dreamer desires. As for crying in the midst of company, it is an expression of the approaching happy occasion. Seeing him crying as he leaves while bidding farewell to someone confirms that he is a person at his mercy. The vision shows that he cares about his religion properly and does not He abandons his prayer no matter what happens. And if he sees tears on his cheek, this is evidence of his involvement in forbidden acts such as adultery, so he repents from this act to please God Almighty. But if the tears remain in his eyes without falling, this is clear evidence that he is hiding his money so that no one will know its location. Either The crying was loud or silent, both express a lot of goodness on its way to the dreamer, and this makes him live in unparalleled happiness in his coming days. But if he cried in a frightening way, this does not portend well, but rather indicates that there is a major crisis for him in the period Coming, and he must prepare well to avoid it in his life. The vision can indicate death if the dreamer sees himself being slapped in a dream, as the slap changes the dream to make it evidence of death. Crying: Crying that does not include any slap or wailing, but rather is harsh crying. And unjust, and expresses his distance from the sorrows and problems of his life. Is it good to see a single woman crying in a dream? We see that this dream, unlike...

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent and sad

preview.html: If the dreamer looks at the unknown dead person and is sad, then this is an indication of the fears that he may experience throughout his life, we will explain that. Follow us through the site of an interpreter. Interpretation of seeing a dead person silent and sad in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the deceased is sad and silent in the dream, he is not talking to her. It indicates that she is going through some bad things in her life and is making bad decisions, and God knows best. And the vision The unmarried girl in a dream means that the dead person is silent and sad, and she knows him well in the dream. It indicates that she is speaking badly about this dead person while he is in the afterlife, and he must stop. This is an indication that she will go through a major crisis in her life during this time. And God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about fire, the meaning of lighting a fire in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about burning me with fireInterpretation of a dream about burning fireFire in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about a fire in the kitchenInterpretation of a dream about a burning person Extinguishing a fire in a dreamSeeing fire in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about a fire in a neighbor’s houseThe meaning of fire in a dream and fire in a dreamThe fire symbol is one of the important symbols in a dream as it can be Fire is a good omen and it can also symbolize turmoil and damage to the dreamer or what was referred to in the dream. Seeing fire in a dream if it has a sound or is not in its normal place, is a test and problems that befall the dreamer. Seeing fire in a dream is harmless and in its place Natural is good and beneficial for the dreamer. Seeing lighting a fire in a dream, for cooking, lighting, or heating, is good for the pioneer and food for him. Lighting the flame in a dream, in a stubborn ruling, indicates marriage. Coal in a dream is beneficial and good for the pioneer, because it is coal that ignites the fire used in it. Fire in a dream is good news, warning, war, torment, strength, imprisonment, loss, and sins. Whoever sees: fire in his heart, this is overwhelming love and injustice to the one who left his beloved. Whoever sees: fires, they are two soldiers, and whenever the fire burns with thick smoke, there is greater terror, torment, and sadness. Whoever sees: who He loves fire, he loves war. Perhaps he was obedient to Satan in his disobedience. Whoever saw: What burns in fire in the winter, then earns money. Whoever dreamed: He eats fire, then eats the money of orphans unjustly, or eats forbidden food. Whoever saw: He sold fire and bought a garden, then he sold pigeons and bought a garden, and vice versa. Whoever saw: A person enters the fire and is tormented and then loses his money, or commits sins that require fire, so whoever hits him with fire and does not burn him, that will be fulfilled. Whoever sees: The fire burned some grains and then their price increased, and the fire that burns is a calamity from a ruler. Whoever sees: From the princes that the fire was kindled and then extinguished. Then he isolated himself, and his fire went out. And whoever sees: the flame of a fire on his door without smoke, it indicates Hajj, and the fire on the fingers indicates the injustice of the scribes, and the fire on the palm of the hand indicates injustice in work. Whoever sees: a fire that devours everything that comes upon it, and it has a loud sound. It is war, epidemic, smallpox, or death. And if he sees that it ascended from a place in Paradise, then the people of that place have fought God Almighty with disobedience. And whoever sees: fire burning in some of his clothes or some of his tools, then a catastrophe befalls him. Whoever dreams: that he is struck by the glow of fire, Then it falls into the tongues of men and is mistreated. A good, bright fire is security for the fearful and the proximity of the ruler. And whoever sees: fire coming out of his house, an order or craft is obtained. Whoever dreams: that the ray of his fire shines from east to west, then he knows that he will be remembered in the east and west. And if he sees A fire shines from his head, and there is light and rays in it, and his wife is pregnant, and she gave birth to a son, Yesod, who has a wonderful male. And whoever dreams: that a fire was lit on the top of a mountain, then he approached God Almighty, or his need was satisfied, and if he disappeared, he returned safely. Whoever sees: there is fire in his skirt. It is burning while he is married, and his wife is pregnant, and the fire in the desert is war, and if he takes an ember from the middle of the fire, he will be struck with money forbidden by the Sultan. . Whoever sets fire to people will cause them enmity and hatred, and whoever sets fire to his head will suffer from a serious illness

title: Interpretation of seeing a grandmother or grandfather in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s grandfather: Seeing grandparents in a dream is an indication that the dreamer feels nostalgic for the past. Seeing grandparents in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the dreams and aspirations that the dreamer seeks. This vision may indicate travel for entertainment and pleasure. Seeing a smiling grandfather in a dream is evidence that The dreamer is religious. Seeing a deceased grandfather in a dream can indicate avoiding sins and fun. Seeing a dead grandmother in a dream that she has come back to life, this indicates ambition and that the dreamer is a positive person. Interpretation of seeing a grandmother or grandfather in a dream The dream indicates love for the person who sees The past, happy times and blessed days. Seeing them can indicate the pursuit of goals, dreams, ambition and success. If you see one of the grandfathers here, it means that you are traveling on a walk or on a trip on a walk and changing the place. The dream in the dream shows that when the grandfather smiles For the dreamer, he is close to God and shows signs of religiosity. Also, the vision here indicates not to play and have fun, and to stay away from sins and fear of God. Seeing the grandmother coming back to life shows great ambition and this is a positive and optimistic person. Interpretation of seeing grandfather and grandmother in a dream for a single woman When a girl sees her grandmother appearing ugly And frightening, expressing despair, fear, and fear of something. Seeing a grandmother for an unmarried girl indicates abundance of sustenance and blessings, which indicates that it is an indicator of goodness and happiness. When she sees a grandfather praying behind him, this shows her feeling of security. When a single girl sees grandparents together in a dream Understanding as well as stability in social life with her family. Interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream for a married woman. When she sees them together in a dream, this means kindness, livelihood, and earning halal money soon. Seeing a grandmother in bed here shows good living for the offspring soon. When you see them talking to them, this indicates the fulfillment of a desire and dream. Which I sought within a few days. And when you see the grandfather and grandmother, this indicates the arrival of goodness in the home and the blessing of this woman. Grandparents in a dream for a pregnant woman. When she sees only the grandfather in a dream and he gives birth to a child, this indicates that she will give birth to a female, not a male. And when she sees the face of a smiling grandfather, and joy indicates On the approaching date of birth. The color of goodness appears and makes things easier. Interpretation of seeing a man’s grandparents When you see a man’s grandfather and grandmother, O deceased, this indicates that you will be blessed with goodness, abundance of sustenance, and lawful profit. If a man sees his grandmother in a dream when she is young, this indicates that this man has A relationship with a good girl. The grandfathers they see in a dream indicate problems, worries, and tears for the pioneer, and God knows best. If a grandfather sees a man in a dream, this indicates work, perseverance, and diligence. Interpretation of seeing Nabulsi’s grandparents. When you see a grandfather in a dream, this indicates success in work and an expansion of livelihood, and God I know. When we see the grandfather’s face radiating light, it shows a high degree of commitment and closeness to the Creator. Interpretation of seeing the dead grandfather of Ibn Sirin: If you see the grandfather in the dream, and his clothes and looks are ugly, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about the letter Ta in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the letter T by Ibn Shaheen is different and multiple, and the reason for this is that the scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted the letter T based on many things and symbols that begin with the letter T. You may also be interested in learning the takbir and hearing it in a dream. It should be noted that it has been interpreted by other scholars who specialize in the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation The letter T in a dream. Interpretation of the letter T in a dream. The presence of the letter T in a dream indicates that there is a lot of goodness coming to the dreamer, whether that is through the money he obtains or through finding a new job. Ibn Shaheen explained the presence of the letter T for a single man or a young man, stating That his marriage will soon, or that he will find a job in the case of a married man. As explained to Ibn Shaheen seeing the letter T, the dreamer is very obedient and adheres to the commands of God Almighty and abstains from His prohibitions. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of the letter t by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing the letter T t in a dream as follows: The seer has great knowledge and insight, which is why he has a high status and position among the people, which makes him the one with authority. If the seer finds a lupine and in real life he suffers and complains of an illness that he will die because of, his vision of the rich man also explained that the dreamer It will change the condition of wealth to poverty and lack of living. If the dream is to see the letter T clearly written on the wall, then this person’s life will be filled with love, kindness and joy. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a coffin in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. It is known that the coffin begins with the letter T and it was interpreted by Ibn Shaheen. Shaheen on many things. Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing an open coffin, as well as a closed but empty coffin, does not contain anything for the dreamer, except a set of dreams and goals that he wants to achieve and seeks to achieve, and that he will actually be able to achieve them. Most of these dreams. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. The interpretation of fruits with the letter t by Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing dates and eating them is that her wedding date is approaching and she will deliver a sermon as soon as possible. He interpreted seeing bad dates in which there are insects and flies, that the dreamer is committing a lot of sins. Sins and disobedience, which leads to a bad reputation. Interpretation of seeing figs and apples in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If the figs are white, it is a symbol of the happiness that comes in the dreamer’s life due to a lot of money and good health. Ibn Shaheen also explained by seeing figs that the dreamer is bestowed by God as a blessing in life. Or that he will be one of the people of power and prestige among the people. Seeing or eating apples symbolizes a person obtaining abundant money with blessings, because he was willing to obtain it through legal and legal means. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of some verbs that begin with the letter t by Ibn Shaheen. Being naked in dreams means a lot of judgments and problems because the person cannot behave well. And saying takbeer in dreams is either a victory over those with whom the dispute occurred, or the person has committed many sins and disobedience and then abandoned them and regretted it to God. If

If the dream is to see the letter T clearly written on the wall, then this person’s life will be filled with love, kindness and joy. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a coffin in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. It is known that the coffin begins with the letter T and it was interpreted by Ibn Shaheen. Shaheen on many things. Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing an open coffin, as well as a closed but empty coffin, does not contain anything for the dreamer, except a set of dreams and goals that he wants to achieve and seeks to achieve, and that he will actually be able to achieve them. Most of these dreams. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. The interpretation of fruits with the letter t by Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing dates and eating them is that her wedding date is approaching and she will deliver a sermon as soon as possible. He interpreted seeing bad dates in which there are insects and flies, that the dreamer is committing a lot of sins. Sins and disobedience, which leads to a bad reputation. Interpretation of seeing figs and apples in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If the figs are white, it is a symbol of the happiness that comes in the dreamer’s life due to a lot of money and good health. Ibn Shaheen also explained by seeing figs that the dreamer is bestowed by God as a blessing in life. Or that he will be one of the people of power and prestige among the people. Seeing or eating apples symbolizes a person obtaining abundant money with blessings, because he was willing to obtain it through legal and legal means. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of some verbs that begin with the letter t by Ibn Shaheen. Being naked in dreams means a lot of judgments and problems because the person cannot behave well. And saying takbeer in dreams is either a victory over those with whom the dispute occurred, or the person has committed many sins and disobedience and then abandoned them and regretted it to God. If
